dcterms:creator: Christian Schuldt
Ivan Laptev
Barbara Caputo
dcterms:description: The KTH dataset contains 600 videos that are made up of 25 subjects performing 6 actions in 4 scenarios. Subjects are divided into training, validation, and testing sets as per the KTH protocol.
dcterms:title: KTH

dcterms:creator: Lena Gorelick
Moshe Blank
Eli Shechtman
Michal Irani
Ronen Basri
dcterms:description: The Weizmann dataset contains 90 videos of 9 subjects performing 10 actions. The experiments use the leave-one-subject-out strategy.
dcterms:title: Weizmann

dcterms:creator: Daniel Weinland
RÂ´emi Ronfard
Edmond Boyer
dcterms:description: The IXMAS dataset features different actors, cameras, and viewpoints, consisting of 10 subjects and 11 actions with 1148 sequences. The experiments also use the leave-one-subject-out strategy.
dcterms:title: IXMAS
